mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of the Richmond coal field / by S. Herries De Bow, Mining Engineer, Geol, &c. ; lith. of Ritchie & Dunnavant, Richmond, Va
Mineral resources of Virginia

Richmond or Tide Water coal field its extent, location, formation and connections with the cities of Richmond and Petersburg and with Tide Water, designed as the first of a series to represent the entire mineral resources of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: DeBow, S. Herries. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map ; 36 x 42 cm. on sheet 57 x 51 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Oriented with north toward right margin. [original]

Includes 3 sections: Vertical section from centre of Coal Basin at "Carbin Hill" on the Tuckahoe Creek; Vertical section of the southside formation as shown at Midlothian and Black Heath, etc.; Elongated section of coal formation from north to south. [original]
Includes statistics of coal, distances, manufacturing, merchandising, canals and railroads centering in Richmond; and miscellaneous population and economic statistics. [original]
"Virginia: no. 1."--On two lines at top of map. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Map mounted on linen. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Coalfields--Virginia--Richmond--Maps
Geological cross sections--Virginia--Richmond
Richmond (Va.)--Statistics
